channel.title: Bunch of questions
channel.description: 1.make fun pk item ( i played a server and it had a pk item the item was a highway man mask. when u wielded the funpk item it would allow you to fun pk every where. 2.make anvils work 3.i want max stats 99 not uto go up to 109. i want max lv 124 4.make xp harder (i want it to take 1-2 months to get lv 124) 5.make dbow shoot 2 arrows 6.make npc att and not run away hit 15-30s 7.change hp on npcs thanks alot

item.title: Bunch of questions
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

  1. Code them, in the if used on item statement.
  2. change the max stat in client.java (plus, all 99s would be max of 126, not 124.)
  3. Change exp rates to like 5-10xp in client.java.
  4. npc.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Bunch of questions

1.make fun pk item ( i played a server and it had a pk item the item was a highway man mask. when u wielded the funpk item it would allow you to fun pk every where.
2.make anvils work
3.i want max stats 99 not uto go up to 109. i want max lv 124
4.make xp harder (i want it to take 1-2 months to get lv 124)

6.make npc att and not run away hit 15-30s
7.change hp on npcs
thanks alot
